title: Chicago’s Field Museum Embraces Facts (and Evolution) in New Ad
text:
February 22, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
It really shouldn’t be surprising to see staffers at a science museum embrace their appreciate for facts and evidence… but this is Donald Trump ‘s America, where alternative facts rule the day and science is a four-letter word. 
So enjoy this ad for Chicago’s Field Museum for the celebration of wisdom that it is. We could sure as hell use more of it. 
The entire staff at the Creation Museum just had a collective aneurysm.
